name: Honey Chicken
ingredients: 8 boneless/skinless diced chicken breasts 1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
1/3 C. Honey Jasmine Rice (any rice will work)
steps: In a sauce pan mix all the ingredients together except the chicken. Add the chicken and into the sauce and
cook until the chicken is done. Serve with rice and fried noodles mixed with vegetables. You can also use
this as a marinade (make the sauce and then let it sit in the sauce for 30 minutes or so), then brush it over
chicken as you cook it on the grill or in the oven.
